page.title: 18CUSTOMS in Welwyn G.C.
page.content: Questions asked in a shopping area and in the rural parts indicate that more than half of the residents think that our young town can have{traditions.} The{Water Carvival, Barn Theatre {Festival}and{Lemsford Fete}were the most frequently named existing traditions. Most people seem to like events to become customs and suggestions for the future included sports events such as the "Half-marathon Fun-run", street carnivals and other community gatherings. {Folk stories}do not seem to be very common, only the story linking the song 'Nellie Dean' with Lemsford Mill was actually told to the investigators.
